("entity"<|>"Sécurité routière"<|>"Thematique"<|>"Sécurité routière involves measures put in place to reduce road accidents and enhance safety, recently criticized as ineffective and monetarily motivated.")##

("relationship"<|>"Inégalités"<|>"Pouvoir d'achat"<|>"The rising Inégalités directly affect the Pouvoir d'achat of the middle class, leading to economic disparities."<|>8)##
